title: Ivan Belikov
text:
Ivan Aleksandrovich Belikov (; born 4 December 1996) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Liski">FC Lokomotiv Liski</a> on 10 April 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Arsenal-2%20Tula">FC Arsenal-2 Tula</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Khimki">FC Khimki</a> on 15 July 2017 in a game against <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a>.
